name: Achievement_0
description: Finish a round on any map as the North Vietnamese forces.

name: Achievement_1
description: Finish a round on any map as the US forces.

name: Achievement_2
description: Kill an enemy player with a tripwire trap.

name: Achievement_3
description: Step on an enemy's punji trap.

name: Achievement_4
description: Get 10 kills with a single napalm strike.

name: Achievement_5
description: Destroy a Helicopter as North Vietnamese with a stolen M79 Grenade Launcher.

name: Achievement_6
description: Kill an enemy with the RPG's back-blast.

name: Achievement_7
displayName: I Ain't Got Time To Bleed!
description: Kill an enemy whilst you are bleeding.

name: Achievement_8
description: Kill an enemy with the pick mattock.

name: Achievement_9
description: Kill an enemy from over 250m away with the XM21 Sniper Rifle.

name: Achievement_10
displayName: The Smell of Napalm in the Morning
description: Kill the North Vietnamese commander with napalm.

name: Achievement_11
description: Kill an enemy with an unexploded M79 shell.

name: Achievement_12
description: Use two bandages in one life without dying.

name: Achievement_13
description: Refill an out-of-ammo primary weapon at a Resupply Point.

name: Achievement_14
description: Kill an enemy with a helicopter's tail rotor blade.

name: Achievement_15
description: Kill an enemy with a helicopter's main rotor blade.

name: Achievement_16
description: Kill an enemy by landing a helicopter on them.

name: Achievement_17
description: Get the first kill in a round.

name: Achievement_18
description: Get the second kill in a round.

name: Achievement_19
description: Reopen your team's spawn window in Skirmish mode by capturing an objective as the last man standing.

name: Achievement_20
displayName: The Gang Solves the North Vietnam Situation
description: Finish a game as part of the top-scoring squad in the game.

name: Achievement_21
description: As the VC/PAVN Commander, spawn 8 or more friendly soldiers on your position in a single use of the Ambush ability.

name: Achievement_22
description: Kill 7 enemies with shotgun slugs in a single life.

name: Achievement_23
description: Using the Mosin Nagant (non-sniper), get one kill for every shot fired from a single five round clip.

name: Achievement_24
description: Complete the capture of an objective as the only player in it, in any mode.

name: Achievement_25
description: Kill an enemy North Vietnamese soldier by shooting a booby trap to detonate it.

name: Achievement_26
description: Kill a North Vietnamese soldier while they are standing in water.

name: Achievement_27
description: Shoot down an enemy support aircraft with an RPG.

name: Achievement_28
description: Get a kill with a tripwire trap that hasn't had its second stake planted yet.

name: Achievement_29
description: Kill an enemy player with a crashing aircraft that you shot down.

name: Achievement_30
description: Be killed by a crashing aircraft that has been shot down.

name: Achievement_31
description: As a member of the US forces, kill 5 enemies in a single life while inside a North Vietnamese tunnel.

name: Achievement_32
description: Kill an enemy with an MD82 mine that was detonated by another MD82's explosion.

name: Achievement_33
description: Mark a target with purple smoke that is then bombarded and kills an enemy player.

name: Achievement_34
description: Be killed by enemy artillery whilst in a helicopter.

name: Achievement_35
description: Fire every round of an LMG's starting ammo in a single life.

name: Achievement_36
description: Kill two enemies with a single round from a non-explosive weapon.

name: Achievement_37
description: Kill an enemy with an RPG-7 through a wall or other piece of cover.

name: Achievement_38
description: Safely land a helicopter (using autorotation) after the engine dies at greater than 50m altitude.

name: Achievement_39
displayName: We Just Put Sir Isaac Newton in the Driver's Seat
description: Survive a helicopter crash with two dead pilots or a destroyed main rotor.

name: Achievement_40
description: Witness another player dying from napalm up close, while surviving yourself.

name: Achievement_41
description: Kill 5 enemies using a bayonet.

name: Achievement_42
description: Spend a total of two hours crouched.

name: Achievement_43
description: Spend a total of two hours prone.

name: Achievement_44
description: Mantle 500 times.

name: Achievement_45
description: Get 50 kills with the AC47 gunship.

name: Achievement_46
description: Insert 25 soldiers into combat from the Huey.

name: Achievement_47
description: Spawn 10 times in the back of a helicopter.

name: Achievement_48
description: Get 50 kills with the Cobra's chin turret.

name: Achievement_49
description: Get 10 kills with the Mosin Nagant (non-sniper).

name: Achievement_50
displayName: The Value of Not Being Seen
description: Use camouflage to hide from recon planes for a total of 5 minutes.

name: Achievement_51
description: Get 25 kills as a helicopter door-gunner.

name: Achievement_52
description: Kill 100 Enemy Infantry.

name: Achievement_53
description: Kill 500 Enemy Infantry.

name: Achievement_54
description: Kill 1000 Enemy Infantry.

description: Kill 50 Enemies with LMGs.

description: Kill 250 Enemies with Sniper Rifles.

description: Get 10 Melee Kills.

description: Get 100 Melee Kills.

description: Destroy 5 Enemy Helicopters.

description: Destroy 50 Enemy Helicopters.

description: Destroy 100 Enemy Helicopters.

description: Win a total of 50 rounds, regardless of map or gamemode.

description: Win a total of 100 rounds, regardless of map or gamemode.

description: Win 100 Rounds of Territories.

description: Win 10 Rounds of Supremacy.

description: Win 50 Rounds of Supremacy.

description: Win 100 Rounds of Supremacy.

description: Sprint for a total of 10km.

name: Achievement_81
description: Sprint while crouched for a total of 10km.

name: Achievement_82
description: Get 5 kills with punji traps.

description: Collapse 25 enemy spawn tunnels.

description: Spend a total of 2 minutes climbing ladders.

name: Achievement_88
displayName: I Come From a Land Down Under
description: Finish a round on any map as the Australian forces.

name: Achievement_89
displayName: That's Not a Knife... THAT'S a Knife
description: Bayonet a player who is mid-bayonet charge on an Australian forces map (as either team).

name: Achievement_90
displayName: That's Not a Knife, That's a Spoon!
description: Kill a player who has a bayonet equipped, using melee WITHOUT a bayonet equipped, on an Australian forces map (as either team).

name: Achievement_91
description: Kill an Australian soldier.

name: Achievement_92
description: Complete a round as an Australian soldier with red hair.

name: Achievement_93
displayName: We're the Only Diggers Around Here!
description: As an Australian soldier, kill a North Vietnamese soldier who is in the process of digging a spawn tunnel.

name: Achievement_94
description: Kill 100 enemy soldiers as the pilot of the Bushranger.

name: Achievement_95
description: Kill 50 enemy soldiers as the gunner of the Bushranger.

name: Achievement_96
description: Spot 4 enemies in a single life as an Australian soldier.

name: Achievement_97
description: Who runs Bartertown?! As an Australian soldier, kill an enemy with a stolen RPG.

name: Achievement_98
displayName: Two Men Enter, One Man Leaves
description: Safely land and exit a bushranger with a dead pilot or co-pilot (as either pilot or copilot).

name: Achievement_99
description: Throw a grenade, get blown up by it. (As an Australian soldier)

name: Achievement_102
description: Reload the M1 Garand 250 times.

name: Achievement_103
description: Complete a round playing as the Army of the Republic of Vietnam.

name: Achievement_104
description: Get 100 kills with the M1918 Browning Automatic Rifle.

name: Achievement_105

name: Achievement_106
description: Win three rounds on VNSU-Quang Tri.

name: Achievement_107
description: Be the fourth ARVN soldier killed in a round.

name: Achievement_108
description: Lose a round on A Sau.

name: Achievement_109
description: Win a round on A Sau.

name: Achievement_110
description: Get ten kills with the M1A1 Thompson without taking damage.

name: Achievement_111
description: Shoot down the Skyraider with an RPG.

description: Win a campaign as the South Vietnamese forces.

name: Achievement_115
description: Win campaign as the North Vietnamese forces.

description: Win a round as the North Vietnamese forces with the Ho Chi Minh Trail ability active.

description: Win a Campaign as the South Vietnamese forces before the end of 1975.

name: Achievement_119

name: Achievement_122
description: You'll get square eyes if you sit that close!

name: Achievement_123
description: We'd also have settled for 'block party'.

name: Achievement_124
description: Pilot a helicopter for the first time on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

name: Achievement_125
description: What's a holiday without lazing around on the couch?

name: Achievement_126
description: Time flies when you're having fun!

name: Achievement_127
displayName: Rudolph Won't You Guide my Sleigh...
description: Twas the flight before Christmas...

name: Achievement_128
displayName: Chestnuts Roasting on an Open Fire
description: Burn two enemies with the Flamethrower without releasing the trigger on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

name: Achievement_129

description: Now how did that get up here?
